Function reference

Peak-gene correlations

runGenePeakcorr()
Gene-Peak correlations used for calling domains of regulatory chromatin (DORCs)
dorcJPlot()
DORC J scatter plot
getDORCScores()
DORC scATAC-seq score summarization for single cells

TF-DORC associations

runFigRGRN()
Infer FigR TF-DORC associations
motifPeakZtest()
Peak-based TF motif enrichment Z-test

scATAC-scRNA scOptMatch cell pairing

pairCells()
Pair cells
plotPairs()
Plot ATAC-RNA scOptMatch pairs

Visualizing FigRGRN results

plotDrivers()
Plot FigR scatter profile
rankDrivers()
Rank TF drivers
plotfigRHeatmap()
Plot FigR heatmap
plotfigRNetwork()
Plot FigR Network

Miscellaneous helper functions

centerCounts()
Center single-cell ATAC-seq count data
smoothScoresNN()
Smooth single cell matrix using cell kNNs
plotMarker2D()
Plot marker scores on single cell scatter plots
splitAndFetch()
Split and fetch string subparts
